name: Introduction to Advanced Calculus for Engineers and Physical Scientists 2
description: Continues the advanced calculus for engineers and physical scientists sequence. Theory of integration, transcendental functions and infinite series. MAA 4102 is not recommended for those who plan to do graduate work in mathematics; these students should take MAA 4212. Credit will be given for, at most, one of MAA 4103, MAA 4212 and MAA 5105.
